entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
